sentences.en: He tried to syncretize historical and logical empiricism view on scientific rationality.
sentences.cn: 在关于科学合理性问题上他试图融合历史的和逻辑经验主义的观点。

sentences.en: In order to syncretize different culture, the essay advances the culture syncretism model and concrete ways on the basis of the way of solving conflict.
sentences.cn: 为了使异质文化更好的融合，本文在文化冲突解决方法的基础上，提出了中外合资企业文化融合的模式以及具体的途径。

sentences.en: Whether poets syncretize the excellence of the Book of Songs and Li Sao or not also gives a main clue to grade the poets.
sentences.cn: 同时，是否融合《诗》《骚》的优点成为钟嵘品第诗人高下的主要线索。

trans.tran_en: to combine or attempt to combine the characteristic teachings, beliefs, or practices of (differing systems of religion or philosophy)
